Detailed Description

a facet that holds general information about locale

This facet should be always created in order to make all Boost.Locale functions work

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum boost::locale::info::integer_property

Integer information about locale

Enumerator:
utf8_property 

Non zero value if uses UTF-8 encoding.

enum boost::locale::info::string_propery

String information about the locale

Enumerator:
language_property 

ISO 639 language id.

country_property 

ISO 3166 country id.

variant_property 

Variant for locale.

encoding_property 

encoding name

name_property 

locale name
